Definition: In this task, you will be given an app review. You need to determine whether the sentiment expressed in the review is "Positive" or "Negative".

Positive Examples.input: Fantastic app! When I connect my BT headset  I have it set to read important notifications - add that to Google Now's                 ability to create texts  reminders and calendar events  and my $20 headset has all the functionality of a smartwatch.                     Kudos to the developer!
Positive Examples.explanation: There is an expression of happiness in this text. Hence, it is Positive

Positive Examples.input: Sucks On Honor 6  does not work.
Positive Examples.explanation: There is an expression of sadness and anger in this text. Hence, it is Negative

Negative Examples.input: Does nothing Worthless app does nothing
Negative Examples.explanation: There is an expression of sadness in this text but it is labeled as Positive. It should be Negative

Negative Examples.input: Great application Work's well with my ZenFone 5
Negative Examples.explanation: There is an expression of happiness in this text but it is labeled as Negative. It should be Positive

Instances.input: ?????????? Flawless  I've been looking for something like this  found it  works great for my LG Premiere
Note 4 Does not work properly 1mA constantly
ARE U SERIOUS.... YOU ARE INSANE IF U THINK PEOPLE ARE GOING TO DEAL WITH THE BS UR TRYING TO DO.

Doesn't actually work. Samsung Galaxy S5 just always says 1ma when plugged in (no matter what it's plugged into). 1ma wouldn't charge anything. It should be saying 2 000ma on this charger I have it on.

Fantastic app! When I connect my BT headset  I have it set to read important notifications - add that to Google Now's ability to create texts  reminders and calendar events  and my $20 headset has all the functionality of a smartwatch. Kudos to the developer!
Scam. Showed 1800 mA on my Galaxy S5 even though it was on a 1.0A charger. With how many ads this thing displays  I'm pretty sure it's a scam app.
